Miner's strikes are when [[miners]] conduct [[strike action]]s.
* [[UK miners' strike (1984â1985)]] * [[African Mine Workers' Strike]] 1946 * [[Asturian miners' strike of 1934]] * [[Cripple Creek miners' strike of 1894]] * [[Bituminous Coal Miners' Strike]] 1894, 1974, 1977 ** [[Bituminous Coal Strike]] 1927 * [[Colorado Labor Wars]] 1904 * [[Waihi miners' strike]] (1912, Waihi, New Zealand) * [[United Mine Workers]] strikes 1897 - 1925 ** [[Paint Creek-Cabin Creek strike of 1912]], West Virginia ** [[Ludlow massacre]] 1914 ** [[First_Red_Scare#Coal_Strike_of_1919|Coal strike of 1919]] ** [[Cape Breton coal strike of 1981]] * [[Khewra Salt Mines]] workers strikes 1849 - 1930 * [[Progressive Mine Workers]] strike 1932 * [[Columbine Mine Massacre ]] 1927 * [[1964 Mount Isa Mines Strike]] (1964-5, Australia) * [[Arizona Copper Mine Strike of 1983]] * [[2007 South Africa miners' strike]]
